title: Creamy potato and beef soup
ingredients: ['350ml water', '300g peeled potatoes, cubed', '2 carrots, grated', '1 small onion, chopped', '4 tablespoons chopped green pepper', '1 Scotch bonnet chilli, seeded and finely chopped or to taste', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 cubes beef stock, crumbled', '450g minced beef', '600ml milk, divided', '3 tablespoons plain flour', '225g Kraft processed cheese slices, unwrapped and chopped', '1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper']
